page.title: 15DAILY LIFE IN PATCHWAY EAST
page.content: {My name is Paul,I am 11 yrs.old.}I get up at 7.30,get dressed and after breakfast,put my things in my bag and walk down the road to catch the school minibus. The minibus brings me home at night. At home I watch TV for 1/2hr. then get changed and go out to play football before tea. I go to bed at 10.30 and read for 1/2 hr. before going to sleep. { I am an adult.}I get up at 5.00,have a cup of tea,get washed and dressed and drive to Avonmouth at 5.30. I start work at Savalco at 6a.m. I load wagons until 10.30 then have breakfast.I drive a fork lift truck until 2p.m. when I finish and drive home. I play bowls at 3p.m.,get home at 6p.m.,have tea and help my son with his homework. On mondays I play skittles at 8p.m.get home at 10.30 and go to bed at 11.30.
